aboutMe:
This is my path. A path through lands, flavors, experiences, and feelings…
At heart, I'm a nomad, and my soul's journey is one of exploration, tasting, creating, sensing, and connecting.

If you're looking for classic travel blogs,
you won't find them here.
But you will find many sincere reflections and feelings from my journey.

My name is Maria.
For a long time, I believed that the meaning of life was in work, parenting, and everyday survival—but deep inside, I felt there was something more calling me.
And that's how love for myself was born—
alongside the exploration of my own depths.

Today I live a simple, slow life in the countryside—
alongside the love of my life, two curious geese, and two gentle cats.
I feel connected to myself, to nature, and to the universe.
My motto? To be here and now. Fully present in this moment.

I start my mornings with a glass of warm water with lemon,
watching nature unfold.
These are the moments when life feels enough.
When I feel peace and freedom.
From this silence and presence, this website was born.

If something in my words resonates with your own journey,
I am grateful.
Grateful that I can offer a small piece of my path
to a world longing for more authenticity.

Each of us carries something unique.
I simply offer a glimpse into mine.

sunriseSunset.sunriseText:
Each sunrise is a new beginning.
Not just of the day, but of me.

When the sky gently glows, I don't just watch it—I breathe it in.
With every inhale, I fill my body with light. I awaken my cells, greet my organs, and whisper:
"Good morning. I am here. I am alive."

I collect these moments as reminders
that everything can start anew.
That each day is a chance to shine—from within.

These are my sunrises.
May they touch yours too.
sunriseSunset.sunsetText:
I've seen many of them. Those fiery ones over the desert, softly pink over the ocean, dramatic in the mountains and quiet above city rooftops.
Each one caught me for a moment 
and reminded me how beautiful it is when the day respectfully bows into the night.But the most beautiful sunset?
It's on the terrace of my little house.
There, where I know every corner of the light. Where the wind brings familiar scents. Where the sky paints a different farewell each evening, but the feeling remains the same: this is me, I belong here.
Nothing is more calming, nothing more real.
Maybe because nothing disturbs me. Because there's nothing to catch, prove, or capture.
I just sit. I just am. And the world goes to sleep.

sunriseImages.title: LANZAROTE BEACH (CANARY ISLANDS; SPAIN)
sunriseImages.description: On a quiet beach with volcanic rocks,the sun slowly rises.Warm hues light up the sand and the calm sea,creating a beautiful and peaceful morning scene.

sunriseImages.title: ISTANBUL (TURKEY)
sunriseImages.description: The sky in shades of gray,blue and orange gently embraces the sea.People are already rushing to work,while the city awakens on soft light.

sunriseImages.title: CAPPADOCIA (TURKEY)
sunriseImages.description:
Golden white morning in Cappadocia.The sky fills wish hundreds of balloons,slowly rising like gentle breaths of color caught in soft light.
Stone chimneys stand tall,wrapped in morning mist that melts beneaththe warm embrace of the first sun.Silence floats in the air,full of promises-freedom breathing through every pulse and hue,until the sky becomes an endless canvas of dreams.

sunriseImages.title: DAWN-SOMEWHERE ABOVE THE CLOUDS
sunriseImages.description: While all sleeps and night quietly lingers,somewhere in the distance,among mist and clouds,a sliver of light begins to appear.It gently heralds the arrival of the sun-the birth of a new day and with it,the promise of new hope.

sunsetImages.title: NILE IN LUXOR (EGYPT)
sunsetImages.description: The Nile and the palm trees around it glow with the warm colors of the sunset.A moment of quiet and peace that fills you with energy.

sunsetImages.title: LAKE GARDA (ITALY)
sunsetImages.description: The sky turns warm shades of orange,seagulls circle above the lake and the water gently laps the shore.A pieceful and magical evening.

sunsetImages.title: WADI RUM (JORDAN)
sunsetImages.description: The sun slowly sets behind the sandy dunes of Wady Rum,painting the desert in warm orange and yellow tones.The silence and vast sky create a feeling of freedom and peace.Every moment invites a deep breath and admiration of the raw nature.

sunsetImages.title: THULUSDHOO (MALDIVES)
sunsetImages.description: The sea is calm,gentle waves touch the sandy shore.The sky turns soft shades of grey and pink as the day fades into evening.A moment of tenderness and perfect peace.

sunsetImages.title: OIA,SANTORINI (GREECE)
sunsetImages.description: A cross in the silence of sunset.Santorini glows in golden hues,the sky breathes with the sea and the heart pauses in the sacredness of the moment.

sunsetImages.title: KAMNIK (SLOVENIA)
sunsetImages.description:
The sky burns with fiery hues.
The color spreads gently.
Warmth flows through the air.
Silence holds the space.
Everything is at peace.
